mapper.select: select wr.*, a.cate_name as "cate_no1", b.cate_name as "cate_no2", c.cate_name as "cate_no3" from tbl_workroom wr left join tbl_memberdetail mem on wr.user_id = mem.user_id left join tbl_hobby_cate a on mem.cate_no1 = a.cate_no left join tbl_hobby_cate b on mem.cate_no2 = b.cate_no left join tbl_hobby_cate c on mem.cate_no3 = c.cate_no where wr.user_id = #{user_id}
